sentences.en: An official protest could carry considerable clout .
sentences.cn: 正式的抗议可能具有相当大的影响力。

sentences.en: Breakfast shall be on the board in the wringing of a dish - clout.
But China's market clout is not matched by its governance prowess.
sentences.cn: 但是,中国对市场的影响,与其治理能力并不相符.

sentences.en: He gave the little boy a clout on the head.
sentences.cn: 他在那小男孩的头部打了一下.

sentences.en: He has a lot of clout with the board of directors.
sentences.cn: 他对董事会有很大的影响力.

sentences.en: How about Lehman's Street clout and Standard Chartered's emerging - markets network?
sentences.cn: 比如勒曼在华尔街的小分舵同渣打银行市场强化网络的合作?

sentences.en: I was half tempted to give one of them a clout myself.
sentences.cn: 我自己都特别想给他们某个人一拳。

sentences.en: If the photocopier stops working just give it a clout.
sentences.cn: 如果那部影印机停止运转的话就敲它一下.

sentences.en: Mr Sutherland may have the clout needed to push the two trading giants into a deal.
sentences.cn: 萨瑟兰先生也许有能力促使两大贸易巨头达成协议。

sentences.en: She longed to clout him in the nozzle.
sentences.cn: 她真想猛揍一下他的鼻子.

sentences.en: Still, the takeover would give Microsoft greater clout in other areas.
sentences.cn: 微软仍可利用这一收购更大幅度的渗入到其他市场领域中.

sentences.en: Subspecies just do not carry as much political clout.
sentences.cn: 因为亚物种一般很难引起政治家的注意.

sentences.en: That businessman has a lot of clout at city hall.
sentences.cn: 那位商人在市府里很有影响力.

sentences.en: The company wields enormous clout in the car market.
sentences.cn: 这间公司在汽车市场握有巨大的影响力.

sentences.en: The two firms wield enormous clout in financial markets.
sentences.cn: 两家公司在金融市场有非常大的影响力。

sentences.en: You have clout with the mayor, You try it.
sentences.cn: 你对市长还有点影响力, 你去试试看.

phrases.phrase: ne'er cast a clout till May be out

trans.tran_cn: 敲打，猛打，（尤指政治上的）影响，破布

trans.tran_en: to hit someone or something hard
